cast.name: 米歇尔·勒格朗 Michel Legrand

awards:
第77届戛纳电影节(2024)
　　金眼睛奖(提名) 达维德·德希特

director.name: 达维德·德希特 David Dessites

this_title: Il était une fois Michel Legrand
trans_title: Once upon a Time Michel Legrand
法国曼妙之音：米修勒格朗(港)
introduction: Michel Legrand, jazz musician and composer extraordinaire, has left his mark on the history of cinema, including the films of Jacques Demy, especially The Umbrellas of Cherbourg, the 60th anniversary of which is being celebrated in Cannes. Using never-before-seen archives and personal accounts, the film looks back on a lifetime dedicated to music, and the career of a man who served it masterfully to the very end.
foreign_title: Il était une fois Michel Legrand
